GSD.description:
lockd: detect and reject lock arguments that overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit e9ba81ee1cbd4eb54c7b5a7b49ee272bf9bb62cb. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: lockd: detect and reject lock arguments that overflow
